attributes.action: Hold a 2nd EU referendum once an EU withdrawal agreement is in place
attributes.additional_details: At the 23 June EU referendum the British people were asked if they wanted to remain or leave the EU. However, the implication of a leave vote was not clear at the time, given that a withdrawal agreement had not yet been negotiated. Therefore, we the undersigned call for HM Government to hold a second EU referendum to allow the British people the opportunity to decide whether they, when presented with a negotiated withdrawal agreement, now wish to remain in the EU or proceed with leaving the EU.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to hold a second EU referendum once an EU withdrawal agreement is in place.
